# aap_host (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `inventory_id` (Number)
- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `enabled` (Boolean)
- `groups` (Set of Number) The list of groups to assosicate with a host.

### Read-Only
